snippet: Lawrence MacDonald, founder of a new group for baby boomers, hopes to recruit them to engage in civil disobedience on climate change and other causes.
lead_paragraph: Lawrence MacDonald, founder of a new group for baby boomers, hopes to recruit them to engage in civil disobedience on climate change and other causes.

headline.seo: Recruiting Boomers to Protest Climate Change
headline.main: An Arresting Way for Boomers to Protest
